Interface SpellCorrection


  • public interface SpellCorrection
    An interface for spelling correction.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String correct(java.lang.String text, java.util.Properties props)
      Spell-corrects the given text

    • Method Detail

      • correct

        java.lang.String correct(java.lang.String text,
                         java.util.Properties props)
        Spell-corrects the given text
        Parameters:
        text - the text to correct
        props - the properties to read spelling correction parameters from
        Returns:
        the corrected text
